title: harasi mudA kimu
sahitya:
harasi mudA kimu halahalakAlam 


anupallavi

  hari caraNAmbujamayi bhaja mAnasa nirayamaya kaluSa nIradhi poOtam


caraNam 1    smara dahanE mAmAcalabhadAmEhi taruNIndhana bhrshapari lasitE
    caraNam 2    surataTI nItaTE sukhataramAvasa paramahamsa nikara parivrtOpAntE
    caraNam 3    ati mEcakamudirAbhamayE bhaja shrita kushaladamiha shrI padmanAbham
